title: Platform Engineer
description:
**About Froda** 




 Froda was founded in 2015 with a clear vision – to revolutionize the banking experience for entrepreneurs by making it easy and affordable to invest in their ideas. Today, we are one of Sweden's fastest-growing fintech companies with large international growth plans. We are a creative tech company with the ambition to turn a historically expensive and unfair industry into something ethical and sustainable by promoting entrepreneurship.
 



  





 Our mission to revolutionize the banking experience for entrepreneurs is not only reflected in our products but also in our workplace. By fostering a culture of respect, collaboration, and continuous learning, we provide opportunities for personal growth and professional development. Join us in transforming the banking industry and be a part of our journey to empower entrepreneurs.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 As Froda continues to scale, we’re looking for a Platform Engineer to join our Platform team — the team at the heart of our technology. The team’s mission is to build and maintain the internal platform that enables and supports our developers to deliver reliable, scalable, and secure fintech solutions efficiently.
 



  





 In this role, you’ll work closely with engineers across Froda to understand their needs and ensure they have the tools, environments, and automation required to succeed. You’ll be part of a small, high-impact team that values helping others, simplifying complexity, and improving developer experience through collaboration and support.
 



 Your work will directly impact how quickly and safely our product teams can innovate, making you a key enabler of Froda’s growth.
 



  





**Who You Are** 




 You’re a technically skilled engineer who takes pride in building robust, scalable systems that others can depend on. You see infrastructure as a shared foundation, one that requires both strong technical execution and close collaboration. You thrive in a team environment, value clear communication, and enjoy enabling others to move faster and more confidently.
 



  





 We’re looking for someone who:
 


* Thrives in a collaborative environment where support and communication are key.
* Enjoys solving infrastructure challenges and enabling others to succeed.
* Is proactive, approachable, and has a strong sense of ownership.
* Balances technical depth with a genuine interest in teamwork and shared success.



  





**Key Qualifications** 




**Experience:** 




 2–5 years in a Platform Engineering, DevOps, or Infrastructure role.
 



**Skills & Tools:** 



* **Infrastructure as Code:** 
 Experience with Terraform or similar IaC tools.
* **Cloud Platforms:** 
 Hands-on experience with Azure, GCP or AWS.
* **CI/CD:** 
 Ability to design, implement, and improve pipelines that serve multiple teams.
* **Containers & Orchestration:** 
 Strong understanding of Docker and Kubernetes in production.
* **Monitoring & Observability:** 
 Experience with tools that support proactive issue detection and team visibility.
* **Security:** 
 Awareness of cloud security best practices and shared responsibility models.



  





**What’s in it for You** 




 At Froda, you’ll be part of a company that combines the best of both worlds, a fast-moving, high-energy culture with the stability and structure to support long-term success. We’re 100+ ambitious self-starters who genuinely care for each other and the work we do, all while having fun together.
 



  





 Here, you’ll have the opportunity to take ownership of your work, develop your skills, and shape your own growth journey. With big ambitions and a rapidly evolving business, there’s plenty of room to grow, lead initiatives, and make a real impact on both our company and the industry. If you're looking to be part of a success story and contribute to something bigger, this is the place for you.
 



  





 Furthermore, you’ll get:
 


* An opportunity to be part of an exciting journey, shaping the future of our company and transforming the SME financing landscape
* Fabulous office overlooking Stockholm and a friendly culture that values work/life balance
* We prioritize working in the office to maximize the positive impact of in-person collaboration, but we offer flexibility with work hours and remote work
* Competitive compensation package
* Insurance and pension plan



  





 This role is all about building the tech that powers funding for thousands of entrepreneurs, if you're excited by our mission, apply or tell a friend!

title: Backend Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
* Help manage the fleet of dbt: ensure undisrupted operations (scheduling and execution), up-to-date functionalities and features.
* Help deliver an AI-assisted migration from BigQueryRunner (in-house SQL transformation and scheduling tool) to dbt, powered by Honk, client's agentic coding system.
* Contribute to building data verification loops (tests, lineage, contract checks) that enable agentic and safe migration from BQ Runner to dbt, as well as other changes to data pipelines.
* Help explore open-source and commercial SQL transformation options, as alternatives to dbt-core and perform light-weight technical evaluations and prototyping.


**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Fluent in Python, bash scripting, (Java)
* Deep knowledge of the modern analytics data stack (SQL, dbt or other tooling for data pipelines).
* Deep and multi-year knowledge of SQL-like languages and data warehouses like BigQuery.
* Experience with employing AI code assistants to increase own efficiency.
* Familiar with the principles of AI engineering (building products on top of foundational models)
* Hands on experience with agentic systems is a huge plus.


**Application deadline:** 
 25-11-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Program Manager With Ecommerce
description:
**Program Manager With Ecommerce:** 




  





 For one of our globally leading tech clients we are urgently looking for an experienced Program Manager With Ecommerce for a long contract based in Stockholm, Sweden
 



  





  





 Its paying well and my client can interview asap!
 



  









**Role Description:** 




 This is for Ecommerce program called OnRep. Program Manager with Ecommerce experience is a must, should be well versed with MS Office tools.
 


* Develop and maintain the overall program roadmap, timelines, and governance structure.
* Coordinate across multiple teams, including IT, digital, marketing, product management, operations, and customer service.
* Ensure clear and transparent communication with business stakeholders and facilitate collaboration between business stakeholders and technical teams to ensure shared understanding and buy-in.
* Provide regular updates on program status, risks, and issues to executive sponsors and stakeholders and prepare materials such as slide decks for steering committee meetings and governance board meetings.
* Serve as the primary point of contact for senior leadership, external vendors and partners.
* Work closely with change management teams to develop training, communication, and rollout plans.
* Ensure the solution meets business requirements, compliance standards, and quality benchmarks.



  





  





**Essential Skills:** 



* Program Manager with Ecommerce experience is a must.
* Well versed with MS Office tools.
* Ability to develop and maintain program roadmap, timelines, and governance structure.
* Strong coordination and communication skills across multiple teams and stakeholders.
* Expertise in preparing executive-level updates and governance materials.
* Familiarity with change management and rollout planning.



  





  





 If this is you, then please do not delay in applying!

title: Business Analyst
description:
**Business Analyst – MS Dynamics**
**Boliden is a high-tech metals company with its own mines and smelters that works long-term to guarantee society's access to base and precious metals. For a century, our work has been part of the value chains that have shaped modern society. At Boliden, we know that the metals we mine and make available will continue to play a crucial role in the future – what matters is how we produce them. Become a part of us and drive change for generations to come.**
**Your opportunity**
 Boliden IT is seeking an experienced
 **Business Analyst** 
 to play a key role in stabilizing and further developing our
 **Sales & Logistics Platform (SLP)** 
 based on
 **Microsoft Dynamics** 
 . We are embarking on a significant improvement journey where requirement quality, change management, and collaboration between IT, Business, and delivery partners will be strengthened.
   

  

**What you will do:**
 As a Business Analyst, you will act as the vital link between business stakeholders and IT, ensuring that our MS Dynamics SLP meets expectations and delivers value. You will capture, analyze, and translate business needs into clear, actionable requirements and follow them throughout the entire change lifecycle.
   

  

 You will also drive improvements in ways of working, enhance requirement specifications, and support a more structured approach to backlog, incident, and change management.
   

  

  

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Capture, analyze, and document business requirements and processes within Sales & Logistics.
* Translate business needs into high-quality functional specifications.
* Ensure solution proposals and deliveries align with actual business requirements.
* Collaborate with Service Areas, Enterprise Architecture, delivery partners (e.g., Sogeti), and internal IT teams on requirement handling and solution design.
* Support planning and execution of User Acceptance Testing (UAT).
* Identify gaps in requirements management and propose process improvements.
* Actively contribute to reducing backlog and improving delivery quality.
* Facilitate workshops, process mapping, and decision-making between Business and IT.
* Ensure effective knowledge transfer across Business, IT, and suppliers.
* Provide guidance on governance, processes, competencies, and communication structures within Application Management.


  

  

**What You Bring**
 You are a structured, analytical problem solver with strong communication skills. You excel at translating business needs into technical solutions and bringing clarity to complex environments.
   

  

* Proven experience as a Business Analyst in complex IT environments.
* Strong understanding of requirements management, change management, and incident processes.
* Experience with MS Dynamics or similar ERP/CRM/business platforms.
* Excellent analytical and documentation skills.
* Ability to facilitate workshops and manage stakeholder expectations.
* Strong interpersonal and communication abilities, both written and verbal.
* A consultative mindset with a holistic view of processes and dependencies.
* Financial understanding to support cost and effort estimation processes.


**What We Offer**
* A key role in a critical improvement journey for one of Boliden’s core business platforms.
* The opportunity to influence processes, governance, and collaboration models.
* A dynamic environment where your expertise directly contributes to stability, efficiency, and business value.
* A workplace that values continuous improvement, transparency, and teamwork.


**Ready to make an impact? Apply now and join us in shaping the future of Boliden’s digital journey.**
**Location** 
 : Stockholm
   

  

**Why work with us**
 At Boliden, we believe in promoting a workplace where care, courage, and responsibility are central to everything we do. We offer a workplace where we believe in collaboration and where what you contribute will have a direct impact on future generations. We are a company made up of responsible and creative people all working towards the same vision; to become the most sustainable and respected metal supplier in the world.
   

  

**Apply today to be part of something truly meaningful!**
 At Boliden, diversity and inclusion are drivers of innovation. We know that different perspectives and experiences strengthen us and help us stay at the forefront of an important and exciting industry. Therefore, we encourage applications from people with diverse backgrounds and viewpoints. Together, we build a workplace where everyone can feel safe and inspired to reach their full potential.
   

  

 Want to know more about the position? Contact hiring manager, Yalda Hosseini yalda.hosseini@boliden.com. Questions about the application are answered by our Talent Acquisition Partner, Jessica Grönwall jessica.gronwall@ext.boliden.com
   

  

 Union information is available from Andreas Mårtensson (Unionen) +46 70-541 83 93, Ingela Scherling (SACO) +46 70-272 08 68, Peter Markström (Ledarna) +46 910-77 40 09
   

  

**Last day to apply: 2** 
**nd** 
**of December 2025.**
 As part of Boliden’s qualitative recruitment efforts and systematic safety work, background checks may be included in the recruitment process.
   

  

*If you are a representative of a recruiting company, please refrain from contacting us about this advertisement. We appreciate your consideration.*
 Important! If you are a current employee within Boliden you shouldn't complete the application at this site, please log on to your Workday account and apply through "Find Jobs".

title: Teamlead/Devlead
description:
Vi söker en erfaren Teamlead för ett tidsbegränsat uppdrag som täcker en föräldraledighet. Uppdraget avser en organisation som befinner sig i en pågående digital transformation, där utvecklingsteamet är centralt för verksamhetsnära utveckling. Miljön består av tre leveransteam inom Integration, Datalager/BI och App/AI-utveckling. Rollen ingår i teamet för Taktik & Leveransstöd som ansvarar för planering, prioritering och koordinering av initiativ tillsammans med PMO och arkitekter.
   

  

 I denna nyckelroll kombineras strategisk styrning med operativt utvecklingsarbete, och du förväntas bidra både i koordinering och som aktiv utvecklare inom ett av områdena.
   

  

**Uppdragsbeskrivning / arbetsuppgifter**
* Leda status- och beredningsmöten där pågående och kommande initiativ planeras och diskuteras.
* Prioritera initiativ och koordinera med verksamheten i planerings- och beställningsfas.
* Vara bollplank till DevLeads i de tre leveransteamen och stötta i den operativa planeringen.
* Följa upp leveranser inom alla team samt vid behov driva dialoger med beställare och PMO.
* Presentera månatlig status till IT-ledning och beslutsforum, inklusive uppstart av nya initiativ efter förankrad tidsplan.
* Delta i utvecklingsarbete inom ett av områdena Integration, Datalager/BI eller App/AI-utveckling.
* Säkerställa kvalitet och livscykelhantering i utvecklade lösningar för att undvika incidenter.
* Bidra till att driva organisationens digitala transformation och stärka datadrivet arbetssätt.


**Skallkrav**
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att leda team, projektledning, Scrum Master-roll eller liknande.
* Förmåga att arbeta med många parallella initiativ och koordinera mellan IT och verksamhet.
* Erfarenhet som utvecklare inom Integration, Datalager/BI eller App/AI-utveckling.
* God kommunikativ förmåga i dialog med både tekniska och icke-tekniska intressenter.
* Kunskap i minst två av följande verktyg/system:
+ Azure DevOps
+ Snowflake
+ API Management
+ Logic Apps
+ Power BI
+ Power Apps

* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska (koncernspråk).


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av LeanIX.
* Möjlighet och intresse att samtidigt axla DevLead-ansvar i ett av leveransteamen.


**Personliga egenskaper**
* Leda och följa upp – trygg och tydlig ledare som motiverar och ger förutsättningar för utveckling.
* Besluta och starta aktiviteter – tar initiativ, agerar snabbt och driver arbetet framåt.
* Presentera och kommunicera information – tydlig, förtroendeingivande och van att tala inför grupper.
* Arbeta med människor – prestigelös lagspelare med god förmåga att samarbeta och stötta andra.
* Skapa relationer och nätverk – bygger starka relationer och hanterar konflikter på ett konstruktivt sätt.
* Anpassa och reagera på förändring – flexibel och trygg i en miljö som förändras snabbt.
* Planera och organisera – strukturerad med god förmåga att planera utifrån mål och deadlines.
* Leverera resultat och uppfylla kundförväntningar – kvalitetsfokus och driv att nå uppsatta mål.


**Info**
**Start:** 
 2025-12-15
   

  

**Slut:** 
 2026-06-30
   

  

**Omfattning:** 
 Heltid
   

  

**Plats:** 
 Huvudkontor i Stockholm 3 dagar/vecka

title: Säkerhetsanalytiker/säkerhetsarkitekt
description:
**Vill du vara med och stärka säkerheten i en organisation som gör skillnad?**
 Vi på Softronic söker nu en säkerhetsanalytiker och/eller säkerhetsarkitekt till vårt interna säkerhetsteam.
   

  

 Det här är en roll för dig som vill kombinera teknik och samhällsnytta och bidra till att skydda både vår verksamhet och våra kundleveranser.
   

  

**Varför du kommer gilla att jobba med oss**
 Hos oss blir du en del av en engagerad säkerhetsgruppering där vi stöttar, utmanar och lär av varandra. Vi har ett gemensamt mål, att göra Softronic ännu starkare och tryggare.
   

  

 I rollen kommer du bland annat att:
   

  

* Bidra till att upprätthålla och utveckla Softronics interna säkerhet.
* Säkerställa att våra tjänsteleveranser till kunder är robusta och säkra.
* Arbeta med att minska risker och stärka efterlevnaden av ISO 27001:2022.
* Delta i utvecklingen av Softronics ledningssystem för informationssäkerhet.


**Dina arbetsuppgifter kan omfatta**
* Hot- och riskbevakning – Threat Intelligence, deltagande i säkerhetsforum och hotbildsanalyser.
* Incident- och logghantering – Security Event Management, Incident Response (inklusive 24/7-beredskap vid kritiska larm) och samverkan med vår SOC.
* Sårbarhet och åtgärder – Sårbarhetsscanning (Vulnerability Management) och Life Cycle Management av mjukvara inklusive hantering av EOL-risker.
* Proaktivt säkerhetsarbete och utbildning – aktiviteter för att stärka säkerhetsmedvetandet internt och hos kunder


**Vi söker dig som**
* Har erfarenhet av informationssäkerhet, cybersäkerhet eller IT-säkerhet.
* Har god förståelse för ISO 27001 och säkerhetskontroller.
* Är analytisk, strukturerad och bra på att kommunicera säkerhetsfrågor på ett pedagogiskt sätt.
* Trivs med att arbeta både självständigt och i team.
* Har erfarenhet av incidenthantering, logganalys eller säkerhetsarkitektur (beroende på rollinriktning).
* Talar och skriver svenska flytande och är svensk medborgare (krav för säkerhetsprövning i rollen)


**Vad du får hos oss**
 Hos oss får du ett meningsfullt arbete där du bidrar till samhällsnytta på riktigt.
   

  

 Du får också möjlighet att påverka och utveckla säkerhetsarbetet i en organisation med höga ambitioner. Du kommer arbeta i ett team som har starkt förtroende från både kunder och kollegor.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder dessutom en trygg arbetsplats, kompetenta kollegor och en balans mellan arbete och fritid som vi värnar om.
   

  

**Om Softronic – GoodTech**
 Vi på Softronic hjälper våra kunder att utveckla smarta, driftsäkra tjänster som förenklar människors liv och jobb.
   

  

 Det vi gör kallar vi GoodTech – teknik som gör gott i samhället. Hos oss får du vara en del av en kultur där gemenskap, nyfikenhet och utveckling är lika viktigt som själva tekniken.
   

  

**Kontakt**
 Hör gärna av dig till Mathias Angleborn mathias.angleborn@softronic.se om du har några frågor! Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Testledare
description:
**Vi satsar inom testområdet och vi letar efter nya kollegor!**
 Tillsammans bygger vi Cartina, en plats för dig som vill vara med och bidra till vår gemensamma resa i en atmosfär präglad av våra värdeord: Nyfikna, Omtänksamma, Tillsammans & Ansvar.
   

  

 Vi värdesätter en arbetsplats där både medarbetare och kunder står i centrum. Vi hjälper våra kunder att skapa en hållbar morgondag genom vår kunskap om samspelet mellan människa, teknik och affär. Vi har lyckats när kunderna förverkligar sina mål! Vi är ett omtänksamt och nyfiket team med hög kompetens inom IT.
   

  

 Hos oss får du både dela med dig av din erfarenhet och ta del av andras. Vi utvecklas tillsammans och har roligt på vägen! Som konsult på Cartina arbetar du tillsammans med spännande kunder i varierande arbetsmiljöer och uppdrag som ofta sträcker sig över lång tid.
   

  

**Om dig**
 Vi tror att du har minst 5 års erfarenhet som konsult och har arbetat inom branscher som tex. bank/finans, försäkringsbolag, offentlig sektor på myndigheter och/eller inom retail. Du behärskar svenska och engelska i tal och skrift och har relevant utbildning i bagaget. Som person är du affärsdriven och konsultmässig, och du drivs och trivs när du skapar värde för kunden. Du mår som bäst när du har levererat det lilla extra. Du ser det som en självklarhet att vara en del i en gemenskap där du både bidrar och tar del av ökad kunskap och en härlig stämning. Personligt engagemang är något som kommer naturligt för dig och du är nyfiken på dina kollegor, därför träffar du dem gärna när ditt uppdrag och livspusslet tillåter det.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Du är en naturlig ledare inom testområdet och har erfarenhet av att ansvara för testledning av produkt/tjänst i samråd med verksamhet och projektledare. Du har jobbat med testplanering av tester på olika nivåer, t ex systemintegrationstestning, prestandatester, acceptanstester och jobbar obehindrat i Confluence och Jira eller motsvarande.
   

  

 Att arbeta med kravanalys är en självklarhet i din roll och är van att självständig planera, utföra och rapportera kring testning. Du trivs med varierande arbetsuppgifter samt växla mellan det strategiska och operativa ledarskapet. Vi ser gärna att du är ISTQB certifierad.
   

  

 För att kunna ta dig an spännande uppdrag hos våra kunder behöver du kunna behärska svenska och engelska i tal och skrift samt ha relevant högskoleutbildning i bagaget.
   

  

**Meriterande kvalifikationer**
* Certifiering i SAFe eller Scrum master.
* Har affärssystemkunskap inom tex SAP, Microsoft, Oracle, M3 m.fl.
* Har jobbat med flertal programmeringsspråk: C++, C#, Python, .Net, SQL, Java, Javascript.
* Du kanske även jobbat med kravinsamling.


**Vi erbjuder dig** 
  

  

 Utöver en stimulerande roll som konsult hos våra kunder kommer du ha möjlighet att påverka och bidra till Cartinas tillväxt, interna projekt och affärsutveckling. Och inte minst kommer du vara en del av en härlig kultur där olikheter ses som styrkor och där samarbete sker på riktigt.
   

  

**Ersättning**
 Du erbjuds en konkurrenskraftig ersättning med fina förmåner. Mer om våra förmåner hittar du på vår karriärsida.
   

  

**Om Cartina**
 Cartina är ett konsultbolag som grundades 2013. Vi drivs av lyhörda, nyfikna, omtänksamma och erfarna konsulter inom IT-Management, Tech och Service Design. Vi har bred erfarenhet från branscher som retail/FMCG, bank & finans, offentlig sektor, transport och byggindustri där vi hjälpt kunder att nå sina ambitioner. Cartina betyder karta på italienska och den speglar vårt sätt att arbeta på. Den symboliserar även hur vi hjälper våra kunder. Vi tar ut kursen tillsammans och navigerar i nära samarbete mot det uppsatta målet. Vi tar ansvar för att leverera det våra kunder behöver – och lite till.  Mer om oss hittar du här.
   

  

**Övrig information** 
  

  

 Start: I takt med att vi hittar uppdrag.
   

  

 Omfattning: Heltid, tillsvidare med inledande provanställning eller enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Placering: Hybrid - Placering hos kund och på Cartinas kontor på Kungsgatan 59.
   

  

**Rekryteringsprocessen**
 Urval ➖ HR intervju ➖  Chefsintervju ➖  Farfarsintervju ➖  Kontroller ➖  Erbjudande & Avtalsskrivning.
   

  

 Vår ambition är att tillsätta rollerna snabbt och att du som sökande löpande ska få återkoppling under processens gång. Vi har gått ifrån personligt brev i rekryteringsprocessen till förmån för urvalsfrågor. Som en del av rekryteringsprocessen kommer vi ta referenser. Vänligen notera att vi inte tar emot några ansökningar via email med hänsyn till GDPR.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 Cartina är ett konsultbolag som grundades 2013. Vi drivs av lyhörda, nyfikna, omtänksamma och erfarna konsulter inom IT.
   

  

 Vi har bred erfarenhet från branscher som retail/FMCG, bank & finans, offentlig sektor, transport och byggindustri där vi hjälpt kunder att nå sina ambitioner.
   

  

 Cartina betyder karta på italienska och den speglar vårt sätt att arbeta på. Den symboliserar även hur vi hjälper våra kunder. Vi tar ut kursen tillsammans och navigerar i nära samarbete mot det uppsatta målet.
   

  

 Vi tar ansvar för att leverera det våra kunder behöver – och lite till.

title: Technology Strategy Consultant
description:
*Join Accenture Technology Strategy team at our Stockholm office and advise our clients through their digital transformation journeys.*
 Every day we are developing business and technology leaders, bringing together innovation, business development and technology leadership under one umbrella. We offer you the opportunity to join and shape our journey as we work with some of the largest and most innovative companies in the world. In this role you will provide expertise and insights for Accenture clients through value-driven recommendations in the intersection between business and technology strategy.
   

  

**About Accenture** 
 Technology Strategy & Advisory practice:
   

  

 We at Strategy Technology & Advisory help our clients become industry leaders. With our cross-expertise in technology, strategy, and consulting, we work closely with our clients to find their focus areas in the market and identify organizational and technological building blocks to reach the target state. We are helping our clients to create sustainable and digital change for the future to identify value across financial, experience, sustainability, talent, and inclusion & diversity dimensions.
   

  

 Below are examples with areas you could work with:
   

  

  

- Advise clients on how to develop their business by leveraging emerging and established technologies

- Create intelligent operating models to transform and build organizations ready for growth and stability

- Unlock the value of data, architecture, and AI to drive business agility and transformation to a real-time enterprise

- Identify, quantify, maximize, and sustain value realization from technology investments

- … and much more!

 We pride ourselves in building long-lasting relationships with our clients by driving powerful outcomes and inspiring with impact. We act as trusted advisors at the largest and most well-known companies in the Nordics and Globally. We are building a community with the best people based on our Secret Sauce; we believe that transparency and openness, the ability to make impact and make yourself heard, together with a great team feeling and a sense of belonging are our keys to success.
   

  

**Who we are looking for:**
 We are looking for curious people willing to question the current ways of working by utilizing new technologies, agile ways of working and new business models to bring new ideas and innovations to life. With us you will have the opportunity to work with large scale business transformations enabled by digital and be a key advisor for c-suites in leading Nordic companies. We hope you are someone who thrives in a collaborative environment and can make everyone take advantage of their various strengths.
   

  

  

- 3+ years of experience from consulting and/or working with IT strategy, operating models, data & analytics, future tech, cloud strategy, tech transformation etc.

- Ability to identify and pursue new business opportunities

- Put ideas and findings into the right context for the right audience, both written and verbally in English and preferably in Swedish

- An analytical and structural mindset, who can achieve impressive results and thrive in settings where you define, structure, and solve clients pain points

- In addition to delivering projects, we are looking for experiences in team-leading and driving internal activities (e.g. recruiting, social, training, etc.).

- Master's degree in a relevant field with excellent academic results

- Fluent in English

- Flexibility in terms of travel and work across the Nordics is expected

**What we can offer you:**
- Competitive benefit package: truly competitive salary terms, bonus schemes, pension, health insurance, employee stock purchase program and other benefits.

- Market-leading expertise and great learning opportunities: we use our global network of experts to stay up to date on technology and industry trends to be relevant in client dialogue - and we are never fully trained.

- Work in a team dedicated to complex problem solving: utilize the sheer variety of work we do, and the experience it offers, which provide an unbeatable platform from which to advance your career.

- Fun at work and work-life balance - we make good arrangements to combine family life (and leisure time in general) with work life.

**Are you excited** 
**by** 
**the opportunity?** 
 Apply now and attach your CV and Cover Letter in English. We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

 Be sure to follow us on Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn.
   

  

 Do you have questions about the role?
   

  

 Feel free to reach out to hedvig.orvenholt@accenture.com (Tech Strategy Consultant) or magnus.wigern.s@accenture.com (HR/Recruiting)
   

  

 To learn more about Accenture, and how you will be challenged and inspired, please visit our website: Accenture | Sweden | Let there be change

title: AI Growth Engineer
description:
**Vi söker en AI Growth Engineer** 




 Som AI Growth Engineer blir du delaktig i COPR:s AI-uppdrag hos slutkunder. Du har arbetat ett par år efter din utbildning och kommer tillsammans med COPR att arbeta i gränslandet mellan affär och teknik. Tillsammans med COPR:s egna konsulter hjälper du kunder att förbereda sig för morgondagens teknologier.
 



 Du kommer att jobba brett, inom data engineering och AI-strategi. Du skapar struktur, bygger plattformar och vägleder kunder från idé till verkligt verksamhetsvärde.
 



  





**Vad du har har för utbildning och vad du gjort hittills:** 



* Civilingenjör Datateknik - helst med inriktning Machine learning eller AI.
* Har erfarenhet av data engineering, molninfrastruktur, analysplattformar, samt av end-to-end-lösningsdesign.
* Praktisk, hands-on-erfarenhet av att möjliggöra och implementera AI inom företag och organisationer.



  





**Vad du kommer att göra i detta uppdrag:** 



* Designa och bygga AI-redo dataplattformar (tänk Azure, AWS, GCP eller andra AI SaaS redskap)
* Tillsammans med COPR:s konsulter jobba nära kunder för att förverkliga idéer tekniskt.
* Samarbeta med både IT och verksamhet för att skapa verklig förändring.



  





**Varför det här är viktigt för oss på COPR:** 




 Vi tror att AI börjar med människor som vågar utmana. I den här rollen kommer du att få jobba med verklig införande av AI. Du står mitt i en verklig AI-transformation!
 



  





**Om oss** 




 COPR är ett konsultbolag i hjärtat av Stockholm. Vi grundades 2015 och har en stabil kundbas. Bland våra uppdragsgivare finns affärsbanker, stora industriföretag, offentliga förvaltningar och myndigheter.

title: Frontend Engineer - Installation and Customer Care
description:
10% of Europe's CO₂ emissions are caused by residential heating and energy bills are out of control. Aira is here to change that.
   

  

 With our intelligent Aira Heat Pump at the heart, we're making the switch to clean energy-tech easier and more affordable. Helping Europe turn off gas and slashing energy costs one home at a time.
   

  

 Founded in 2022, and with 1000+ employees and counting, Aira is driving the clean energy revolution by providing homes with modern clean energy-tech solutions such as solar power, battery storage solutions and heat pumps. With a state-of-the-art production facility in Poland, an HQ in Stockholm, Sweden, and hubs across the UK, Germany, and Italy, Aira is well on track to install clean energy-tech into 5 million homes by 2034.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As an App Engineer on our Installation & Customer Care team, you'll build the digital tools that empower our field workforce to deliver clean energy solutions efficiently. You'll work across mobile apps and web platforms to create seamless experiences for installers, technicians, and support teams.
   

  

 In this role, you will:
   

  

  

* Own, build and maintain our installer mobile app using Flutter for iOS and Android
* Design digital workflows that replace manual paperwork and improve operational efficiency
* Build systems that enable real-time collaboration between installers, planners, and customer care
* Develop data collection and reporting tools to drive continuous improvement


 We're digitizing how clean energy gets installed and maintained. If you enjoy building tools that have real-world impact and working across the full technology stack, this role is for you.
   

  

**What You Bring To The Team**
* An interest in learning Flutter for mobile app development
* Experience with React
* Experience with agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)


**What is in it for you?**
* Work at a fast-growing clean energy company making a real environmental impact
* Build tools that directly help field teams deliver clean energy solutions
* Collaborate with international teams and launch products globally
* Work across web, mobile, and backend technologies
* Hybrid work flexibility at our new Stockholm office near public transport
* Supportive, inclusive culture with career advancement opportunities


 At Aira, we believe diverse teams build better products. We welcome people from all backgrounds to help us create a cleaner energy future.

title: Financial Controller - Two Circles Stockholm
description:
**Two Circles** 




 We are Two Circles. We are a Sports & Entertainment Marketing business. We grow audiences and revenues. We do that by knowing fans best. We work with clients to help them understand & influence what their fans are doing - the way fans spend their money, the events that fans attend, the channels fans respond to, the content fans watch and more. And we use the understanding this gives us to help our clients grow. Grow their audiences and grow their revenues - both direct to consumer and business to business revenues. Our platforms and services are trusted by over 1000 clients globally, including the English Premier League, Red Bull, UEFA, VISA, the NFL, Nike and Amazon. We are over 1000 people, based out of 15 offices, and we deliver work for sports and entertainment businesses of all shapes and sizes all over the world.
 



 We're now looking for a Financial Controller to join our Stockholm-based Finance team. This role is central to the continued growth and development of Two Circles Sweden, ensuring best-in-class financial control, reporting, and analysis across our Swedish entities and group operations.
   

  

 As Financial Controller, you'll work closely with the Finance Manager and leadership team to drive accuracy, efficiency, and insight in all financial processes. You'll take the lead on group reporting, budgeting, and forecasting, while continuously improving systems and structures to support a fast-growing, international business.
   

  

 The role combines hands-on accounting expertise with a strategic mindset and offers the opportunity to shape how financial operations evolve within one of the world's most exciting sports and entertainment businesses.
   





**Role Responsibilities** 




 • Lead and manage the group's monthly financial reporting, including P&L,
 



 balance sheet, and cash flow consolidation.
 



 • Ensure accurate subsidiary accounting and reporting across all Swedish
 



 entities.
 



 • Drive budgeting and forecasting processes across the group, collaborating
 



 closely with the Finance Manager and senior leadership.
 



 • Oversee cash flow planning and analysis, maintaining a clear view of liquidity
 



 and capital requirements.
 



 • Conduct detailed financial reviews and performance analyses, providing
 



 insight to inform strategic decision-making.
 



 • Support external reporting to investors, banks, and authorities, ensuring
 



 compliance with all statutory and regulatory requirements.
 



 • Build and enhance internal financial structures, reporting frameworks, and
 



 control processes to match a growing, international organization.
 



 • Develop and track key financial KPIs, partnering with internal teams to
 



 improve business performance and cost efficiency.
 



 • Manage audit processes and ensure adherence to accounting standards
 



 (K3).
 



 • Support integration and development of group-wide systems and reporting
 



 tools to streamline operations.
   

  

  




**Requirements**

 • Degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field.
 



 • At least 4-5 years' experience in financial control, accounting, or audit.
 



 • Experience from smaller, dynamic, or fast-growing companies is preferred.
 



 • Background from an audit firm is highly meritorious.
 



 • Proven experience in budgeting, forecasting, and KPI analysis.
 



 • Strong understanding of financial regulations and compliance requirements.
 



 • Experience working with international organizations or stakeholders (PE
 



 firms, banks) is a plus.
 



 • Advanced Excel skills and strong proficiency with financial systems.
 



 • Fluent in Swedish and English, both spoken and written.
 



 • Self-driven, structured, and proactive - able to balance hands-on detail with
 



 strategic thinking.
 



 • A collaborative, humble team player who embodies Two Circles' values:
 



 curiosity, energy, and a drive to make an impact.
   





**Why You'll Love It Here** 




 • Join a fast-growing, international business shaping the future of sports and
 



 entertainment.
 



 • Work alongside senior leadership in a flat, collaborative environment that
 



 values initiative and innovation.
 



 • Gain exposure to both strategic projects and hands-on financial operations.
 



 • Enjoy the balance of working within a creative, entrepreneurial culture
 



 backed by global scale and resources.
   

  




**Benefits**

 • Competitive salary
 



 • Central Stockholm location, in a dynamic and inspiring workspace.
 



 • Multiple Team Days bringing together global colleagues.
 



 • Performance Reviews every 6 months.
 



 • Gym membership and sporting challenge contributions.
 



 • Two annual kit drops with Two Circles stash.
 



 • A culture that rewards collaboration, ambition, and continuous learning.

title: Software Engineer BE
description:
**Juni who? 👋**
 At Juni, we’re busy building the future of banking. We want to help businesses do more with less and get access to the financial tools they need to operate, grow, and win globally.
   

  

**How & Why We Do It 🚀**
 We give our people the same thing we’re building for our customers: freedom. Freedom to be 100% yourself. Freedom to explore your potential and what’s more – make the most of it. We truly believe we’re making the world a better place for online businesses, and we want you to be a part of that mission.
   

  

**Your role at a glance 🤸‍♀️**
 You’ll tackle complex challenges and develop clean, scalable solutions. We're looking for someone who’s genuinely passionate about designing and implementing elegant and high-quality software. Staying up to date with your development ecosystem, you’ll make sound choices on tools and libraries for each project. You'll contribute across the entire product stack and collaborate to maintain codebase integrity. Ideally, you have experience with technical challenges related to bank transfers and card payments, or you’re motivated to work in a high-stakes, regulated environment. Most importantly, you consistently connect your work to the broader goals of the business.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities 👏**
 In this role, you’ll:
   

  

* Write scalable, robust, testable, efficient, and easily maintainable code using Golang
* Translating software requirements into stable, working, high-performance software
* Participate in architectural and design decisions, creating and reviewing proposals and polishing them through team collaboration
* Work on key projects related to the kyb and customer domain: kyb flows, notifications, pricing, cashback, credit assessments and obligations, funding providers, risk scoring, fincrime management, customer profile, etc.
* Participate in product monitoring, incident management, on-call support and customer support.


**Tooling ⚙️**
* Slack
* G-suite
* Golang
* AWS SQS, Kinesis, DynamoDB, Lambda.
* PostgreSQL
* Kafka
* Datadog
* Gitlab
* Kubernetes
* Terraform


**Qualifications 👑**
 What we need to see
   

  

* Extensive Experience: A few-years experience in software engineering, with a sustained growth and a hunger to grow into a senior level.
* Technical Expertise: Good understanding and hands-on experience with backend.
* Problem-Solving Skills: Good analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a focus on finding efficient and effective solutions to complex technical challenges.
* Development Standards: Up-to-date knowledge of development standards, methodologies, and best practices, including Agile and DevOps.
* Security Practices: Good understanding of security best practices to ensure the integrity and safety of applications.
* Code Quality: Experience with code reviews, testing, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to maintain high code quality.
* Collaboration: Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively within a team and across departments.
* Ownership and Accountability: A willingness to take ownership of tasks and projects, ensuring timely and high-quality delivery.
* Adaptability: Comfortable working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment and adapting to changing priorities and requirements.
* Stellar communication skills in English.


 What we’d love to see
   

  

* Experience with kyb flows, billing systems, especially Lago, credit.
* Experience in a regulated environment and how this impacts engineering decisions. Ideally in bank transfers or cards domains.
* Experience in fast-paced startups.
* Production experience with Golang.


**Your people 👥**
 Our team is as ambitious as our amazing customers. We aim high and we move with speed to make our vision a reality. We care deeply about building a better future for our customers and each other. Here, you can work with people at the top of their game and who didn’t get there by playing games. You can help us create a whole new category in financial services.
   

  

**Your Benefits 😍**
 We’re freedom-first. Transparent. Caring. Empowering. So our benefits are too.
   

  

* We work hybrid. We'll see you in one of our offices in Stockholm or Gothenburg at least two days per week.
* Swap 2D for 3D. Meet all Junis IRL at the company onsite each year.
* Diversity is at our core. We're part Swedish. Part Canadian. Part French. Part Indian. Part Italian. Part British. Part Portuguese. You get the idea.
* Great players can stay great players. Progress your career whether you choose to manage people or not.
* RSU (Restricted Stock Units). We can’t promise you’ll make a fortune. But we’ll give it our very best shot.
* Vacation days. 30 days.
* Private Health insurance. You know. Just in case
* Beautiful offices in central Gothenburg and Stockholm, front row sea view!


**Additional Information 📌**
* Please note that we are unable to sponsor work visas at this time. Therefore, having a valid work permit for Sweden is a requirement for this role.
* Dear recruitment agencies: we love your enthusiasm, but no calls, emails, or carrier pigeons, please. We’re keeping this one in-house


 At Juni, we’re building the future of banking. We want to help businesses do more with less and get access to the financial tools they need to operate, grow, and win globally.
